project.name: C-C196A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C196A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness reads a number to be used as a loop counter. The loop counter is initially read as an unsigned long, then converted to an int. If the number read in is larger than MAX_UINT, it is silently converted to a negative number. This breaks the loop counter logic, resulting in an infinite loop. Good inputs: taint source is 2147483647 or less Bad inputs: taint source is 2147483648 or greater

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.description: This weakness reads a number to be used as a loop counter. The loop counter is initially read as an unsigned long, then converted to an int. process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^evaluating input$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^evaluating input$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_q55gVLx1EZcx4vQN6Hzv AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_BGckdu4cZv OR (NOT finished_qP37vjkxVG AND NOT (controlled_exit_YhFxrSgVa2 OR continued_execution_pB0uyCNPrV)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_BGckdu4cZv OR (NOT finished_qP37vjkxVG AND NOT (controlled_exit_YhFxrSgVa2 OR continued_execution_pB0uyCNPrV))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_BGckdu4cZv OR (NOT finished_qP37vjkxVG AND NOT (controlled_exit_YhFxrSgVa2 OR continued_execution_pB0uyCNPrV)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_BGckdu4cZv OR (NOT finished_qP37vjkxVG AND NOT (controlled_exit_YhFxrSgVa2 OR continued_execution_pB0uyCNPrV)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
